name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clover - Elegant Dashboard tool for your day

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A elegant free theming tool as a dashboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A elegant free theming tool as a dashboard.
* Switch wallpaper every 12 hours
* Suggest useful websites for you
* Access history links easily
* Handy search bar
* Realtime clock
